ai-patthana17.15:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.15:0.3_0: socializing the leading to the object.
ai-patthana17.15:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to the path, or what is unskillful.
ai-patthana17.15:2.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.15:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.15:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.15:3.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to the wrong path. Nor do they give rise to the wrong path.
